parent_header: MmCMS: an R package for consensus molecular subtyping of mouse colorectal cancer models.
result.value:
#

MmCMS: an R package for consensus molecular subtyping of mouse colorectal cancer models.

![MmCMS_Nature portfolio](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c54b4086-a17a-4721-8bc6-bbea40c561a7)

MmCMS package calls CMS subtypes in mouse tissues. The core algorithm is Nearest Template Prediction (NTP) and CMScaller [Guinney 2015; Eide 2017; Hoshida 2010].

Install

Run the following code in R/RStudio to install the package:

#install.packages("devtools")
#devtools::install_github("MolecularPathologyLab/MmCMS")

Citation

The MmCMS classifier R package is developed by the DunneLab. Please contact Raheleh Amirkhah for any package related issues, questions, or suggestions.

You can cite as such:

Amirkhah, R. et al. MmCMS: mouse models’ consensus molecular subtypes of colorectal cancer. Br J Cancer 128, 1333–1343 (2023).

https://www.nature.com/articles/s41416-023-02157-6
